name: Ojas Blend (Vancouver)
address: Ojas Blend (Vancouver), 88 W Pender St Unit 2011, Vancouver, BC V6B 6N9

featured_reviews.review_id:
My go to fav local take out spot! Food is great and authentic. Best place in the city to get fusion wraps. The food is mouthwatering and great quality. A must try for food lovers!!
Definitely gonna order again
featured_reviews.review_text:
My go to fav local take out spot! Food is great and authentic. Best place in the city to get fusion wraps. The food is mouthwatering and great quality. A must try for food lovers!!
Definitely gonna order again

featured_reviews.review_id:
Ordered via Uber Eats and got the BOGO Why not Poke?

Great blend of fresh tuna and veggies with the perfect amount of dressing.

I appreciate the discounted price for buying 2 bowls at $27 (under their BOGO section). If you order just the one bowl, its regular price is $17

Great meals during higher temps

(Find me on Instagram via @aida.loves )
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Aida, we hope you find your 5 star bowl with us soon! As you liked our Why Not Poke? We recommend giving the grizzly bear's catch a try

featured_reviews.review_id:
Absolutely 5 star! Rich flavours and excellent service! I ordered through Uber eats, it came with 2 full bowls, great portion! I phoned to make a modification, the staff was super helpful and made all changes for me. I appreciated for the excellent services.
The Chick Peas was the best I had! Chicken was really fresh and tasty! Highly recommended!
featured_reviews.review_text:
Absolutely 5 star! Rich flavours and excellent service! I ordered through Uber eats, it came with 2 full bowls, great portion! I phoned to make a modification, the staff was super helpful and made all changes for me. I appreciated for the excellent services.
The Chick Peas was the best I had! Chicken was really fresh and tasty! Highly recommended!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing to hear, Olivia! We greatly appreciate the positive feedback.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Me and 4 other girls ordered Uber eats for lunch and what a great lunch spot to try!

We ordered:
* x3 Funky Chicken $16.95 (recommend)
* Cauli Sutra (Chickpea) $21.60 Buy 1 get 1 free (recommend)
* Pacific Prawn Star $16.90  (recommend)

All 3 dishes were super tasty, fresh and well balanced! You get rice under the pickled veggies and salad, the chicken and prawns were juicy and warm still and give a nice middle eastern taste. In the whole bowl you pretty much get a little bit of everything, sweet from the pomegranates, savoury from the chicken, spicy from the jalapenos, tangy from the pickled veggies and a good balance of rice and that great wet sauce on top! Overall highly recommend trying this place out, you won't regret!
featured_reviews.review_text:

Overall highly recommend trying this place out, you won't regret!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Aliz for powering you lunch with us! We love the details you shared here

featured_reviews.review_id: These bowls are absolutely delicious. Super fresh and healthy tasting!  I ordered 2 funky chicken bowls, the chicken was super moist, tender and flavourful. The bowl consisted a lot of variety of veggies, which added lots of crunch, colour, substance and texture. The sauce that was drizzled through out was zesty and refreshing and it helped tie it in all together. Super friendly and fast service too! Great portions, highly recommend
featured_reviews.review_text: These bowls are absolutely delicious. Super fresh and healthy tasting!  I ordered 2 funky chicken bowls, the chicken was super moist, tender and flavourful. The bowl consisted a lot of variety of veggies, which added lots of crunch, colour, substance and texture. The sauce that was drizzled through out was zesty and refreshing and it helped tie it in all together. Super friendly and fast service too! Great portions, highly recommend
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Amanda for the kind words and taking the time to write a review. Customers like you keep us motivated to give our best. We believe in providing exceptional organic food quality and make our own dressings. We appreciate your rating.

featured_reviews.review_id: I ordered the Vegan Holy Tofu Chop, they sent me the Vegan Butter Chicken. Re-ordered the Vegan Holy Tofu Chop and they sent me the Vegan Butter Chicken AGAIN. Still tasty but not my order. If ordering this, just make sure the right order is delivered.
featured_reviews.review_text: I ordered the Vegan Holy Tofu Chop, they sent me the Vegan Butter Chicken. Re-ordered the Vegan Holy Tofu Chop and they sent me the Vegan Butter Chicken AGAIN. Still tasty but not my order. If ordering this, just make sure the right order is delivered.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Phil, we're so sorry about this unfortunate experience. Please let us make it right by reaching out to creative@ojasblend.com so we can personally deliver your order (on us)

featured_reviews.review_id:
This was so delicious!!

I was so full but I wanted to keep eating.

Next time I'll get the extra sauce on the side so the veggies don't get too soggie when I save it for later.

Highly recommend this place, it is pricer than other places but the size you get can be worth 2 meals.

The chick peas were so savory and the chicken 

I can't wait to come back again

Take my money ~

Only down side, the location is far :(

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you so much for all your love, Sandra! 

We really appreciate your feedback about the sauces and will keep it mind to make the freshness last longer. 

We also have deals with Uber eats and too good to go! Both give you great options to save more and enjoy more :)

Happy Holidays!

featured_reviews.review_id:
My wife and I recently had the pleasure of dining at a remarkable restaurant during our 10-day stay in Canada, and it's safe to say that this dining experience was the highlight of our trip. This culinary gem, which we wholeheartedly recommend to all fellow food enthusiasts, is none other than the restaurant where we indulged in the freshest, healthiest, and most delectable dishes we've ever had the pleasure of savoring.
The restaurant's ambiance was cozy and welcoming, creating the perfect atmosphere for a memorable dining experience. However, what truly sets this place apart is its commitment to serving healthy yet incredibly delicious food. We were pleasantly surprised to discover an extensive menu filled with a variety of options to cater to various dietary preferences. As health-conscious individuals, we couldn't have been more delighted.
One of the standout dishes we had the pleasure of trying was the "Grizzly's Catch." This seafood masterpiece was a true culinary delight. The perfectly seared fish was tender, flaky, and bursting with flavor. The accompanying fresh vegetables and light drizzle of sauce complemented the dish perfectly, making it a must-try for any seafood lover.
Another absolute winner was the "Yogi's Paradise." This vegetarian dish was a symphony of flavors and textures. The combination of perfectly grilled tofu, sauteed vegetables, and a mouthwatering sauce made this dish an explosion of taste in every bite. It was a pleasant surprise even for us, non-vegetarians, and it showcased the restaurant's mastery in creating dishes that cater to all palates.
One of the most remarkable aspects of our dining experience was the exceptional service provided by Chef Ankit. His passion for food was palpable, and he went above and beyond to ensure that we were not only well-fed but also educated about each dish's preparation. His detailed explanations and friendly demeanor added a personal touch to our meal, making it all the more special.
In addition to the incredible food and service, we were also impressed by the restaurant's commitment to using fresh, locally sourced ingredients. It was evident that quality and health were top priorities in every dish they prepared.
Our journey in Canada would not have been complete without this culinary adventure, and for that, we are deeply grateful to Chef Ankit and the entire restaurant team. We wholeheartedly recommend this establishment to anyone visiting the area. Whether you're a health-conscious diner or simply in search of a fantastic meal, this restaurant is a must-visit. Thank you for making our trip truly memorable!

Thank you for taking the time and write this lovely review, Dhiraj.
We had a wonderful time serving you and your wife.
